name: @tablepress/tablepress
description: Embed beautiful and feature-rich tables into your posts and pages, without having to write code.
author: Tobias Bäthge

scripts.prebuild: grunt lint && wp-scripts lint-js && wp-scripts lint-style
scripts.build:css: wp-scripts build --config-name tablepress-admin-css && wp-scripts build --config-name tablepress-frontend-css && wp-scripts build --config-name tablepress-modules-css && wp-scripts build --config-name tablepress-frontend-modules-css
scripts.build:js: wp-scripts build --config-name tablepress-admin-js && wp-scripts build --config-name tablepress-modules-js
